articles.author: Jacob Stolworthy
articles.title: Rowan Atkinson and Richard Curtis accuse Friends of stealing their Mr Bean joke - The Independent
articles.description: ‘I literally can’t believe what happened there’
articles.content:
Rowan Atkinson has accused Friends of stealing  a joke from his Mr Bean sitcom.
The comedy actor made the claims in a new ITV series honouring his comedy character for his 30th anniversary.
In the … [+1591 chars]

articles.title: The Masked Singer's Bush Baby 'rumbled' by viewers ahead of second performance - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Masked Singer UK viewers have shared their guesses online, and one name kept topping the theories
articles.content:
The Masked Singer UK viewers are already trying to work out who the characters are, ahead of their next performances.
